meanings.definition: Covered in or resembling a web
meanings.sent1: The old house had a webbier appearance after years of neglect.
meanings.sent2: The Halloween decorations made the room look webbier than usual.
meanings.sent3: The spider thought the webbier corner was the perfect spot for a cozy nap.
meanings.sent4: The fog made the forest look even webbier, like a mystical realm.
meanings.sent5: The dew on the bushes made them look even webbier in the morning light.

meanings.definition: Having more webs than something else
meanings.sent1: The attic was webbier than the basement, with spiders everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned barn was webbier than any other building on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the title of webbier house in the neighborhood was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was tangled and webbier than a bird's nest.
meanings.sent5: The library's archives were webbier than anyone had imagined, filled with dusty tomes.
